channel.title: CVE Feed for Progress -- LoadMaster
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Progress -- LoadMaster

item.title: CVE-2024-6658|2024-09-23T19:19:19.461Z -- progress -- loadmaster
item.description:
Improper Input Validation vulnerability of Authenticated User in Progress LoadMaster allows OS Command Injection.This issue affects:
Product
Affected Versions
LoadMaster
From 7.2.55.0 to 7.2.60.0 (inclusive)
From 7.2.49.0 to 7.2.54.11 (inclusive)
7.2.48.12 and all prior versions
Multi-Tenant Hypervisor
7.1.35.11 and all prior versions
ECS
All prior versions to 7.2.60.0 (inclusive)

item.title: CVE-2024-7591|2024-09-10T03:55:16.126Z -- progress -- loadmaster
item.description:
Improper Input Validation vulnerability in Progress LoadMaster allows OS Command Injection.This issue affects:
* LoadMaster: 7.2.40.0 and above
* ECS: All versions
* Multi-Tenancy: 7.1.35.4 and above
